name: Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom
description:
PLAY AS A CAMERAHEAD IN SKIBIDI TOILET GAME:
Protect the earth and flush those toilets! Try to get all the materials necessary to build a radio-titan and deal a final blow to the enemy faction. Make sure to have your teammates protect you when you assault the enemy base as a tv titan, you don't want to lose it!

PLAY AS A SKIBIDI TOILET


Embrace the chaos as a member of the Toilets, don't let your enemies build a titan by building your own toiletto-giant first! Crush your enemy with numbers and dance on their graves. Don't let tactics or teamwork slow you down, just rush them and dominate the game.

JUST HAVE FUN!


I don't care if you want to save the earth or conquer it. Just have fun, turn your enemies into trash, and dump them into the garbage bin. It's a game, JUST HAVE SOME SKIBIDI GAME FUN TIME!
